channel.title: ERROR with SHOPS (317) NO SOLUTION YET [PICS INCLUDED]
channel.description:
Hello, im updating my shops and creating multiple places in which i want to place them. Here's and example of one of the problems: [b]1st (works):[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2wrp9jb.jpg[/img]
[b]Then:[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mwh3zs.jpg[/img]
So i have that working fine. But the problem happens when i add the shop again. But in another location:
[b]2nd (NOT WORKING):[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/zodvk7.jpg[/img]
Then: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ri7l95.jpg[/img]
And then Nothing... The run.bat command prompt file looks like this after trying to trade:
[b]RUN.BAT[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/16jr9lu.jpg[/img]
Now to look inside the files, and see the codes:
[b]Autospawn.cfg[/b] 1st shop: [code]spawn = 562 2973 3375 0 0 0 0 0 2 Smithing Shop 1[/code] 2nd shop: [code]spawn = 562 2805 2793 0 0 0 0 0 2 Smithing shop 2[/code]
[b]Client.Java[/b] [code] } else if (NPCID == 562) { // SmithingShop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; // Smith Shop[/code]
[b]Shops.CFG[/b] [code]shop = 44 Smithing Shop 2 2 2349 10000 2351 10000 2353 10000 2357 10000 2359 10000 2361 10000 2363 10000 2347 1000 [/code]
Any help is greatly appreciated! =)

item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I haven’t done anything with Private servers in about 2 years now so… Bare with me here. I’m unsure what the boolean variable “PutNPCCoords” does. Try changing it to false and see what happens? Maybe having it true limits it to one NPC at a specific location.
